name: Query Selection Criteria
description: Definition: This field indicates the conditions that qualify the rows to be returned in the query response. (This field conveys the same information as the WHERE clause in the corresponding SQL expression of the query, but is formatted differently.)

fields.name: Segment Field Name
fields.description: The name of the field that is participating as a qualifier (usually the key). Refer to Section 2.8.32, QIP - query input parameter list, for segment field name conventions.

fields.name: Relational Operator
fields.description: Refer to HL7 table 0209 - Relational operator for valid values.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: The value to which the field will be compared.

fields.name: Relational Conjunction
fields.description: Refer to HL7 table 0210 - Relational conjunction for valid values. The relational conjunction is defined as follows: If more than one comparison is to be made to select qualifying rows, a conjunction relates this repetition of the field to the next.
